name: Creative Nightlight Smart Light Alarm Clock Bedside Desk Table Electronic Clock Battery Operated Mute Luminous Alarm Clock with Adjustable Light HA35 (White)
short_description: Small clock design with large LCD displays time and alarm status (ON/OFF) . Smart night light digital alarm clock measures 3.8 (L) * 0.9 (W) * 2.4(H) inches. Perfect valentines day gifts for her, wife, girlfriend and daughter. Large display and big bold numbers. Time is easy to read. Shell Material: Plastic./Powered by: 2 AA Carbon batteries (not included) Gradually enlarge the alarm, Ascending "beeping" alarm for gentle wake; Snooze repeats every 4-6 minutes (Press the Snooze button) Adjustable light intensity,Sliding the key (EVER GLOW)on the top and the light can become bright or dim. GOOD SERVICE:We have a perfect after-sales team, if you encounter any please contact us, we will reply you within 24 hours!
product_description: Easy Settings Alarm Clock Simple settings: A few keys, easy for you to complete a simple setup. Cute Little Size and Battery Operated Alarm Clock Cute silicone protective,shockproof, enough to be practical for your nightstand as a home alarm clock. Whole size of a palm and it battery powered, it can be stashed in bag when travel,handy and portable. Adjustable Night Backlight: There is a silder on the back to adjust the brightness of the backlight. Single Alarm with Snooze Function Single alarm,stronger gradually,wake you up from sweet sleepness softly. When alarm is activated, the clock sounds beep for 60 seconds in a crescendo and will be reactivated 4-6 minutes later. The snooze mode and alarm also may be deactivate. Alarm Clock Battery Operated. 2 x AA 1.5 batteries required(not included) Product Specifications Product Dimensions: 3.9'' (width) x 2.5''(height) x 2.4''(depth) Weight: 0.16 kg

name: REACHER Wood Grain Sunrise Alarm Clock and Sound Machine Nightlight, Digital Dimmable Clock for Bedroom, 26 Sleep Sounds, White Noise Machine for Baby, Adults, Wake Up Light Alarm Clock for Kids
short_description: 【Cut Jarring. Awaken Sunrise】Reacher sunrise alarm clock mimics the glow of natural light. Its sunrise simulation gently brightens your room from 1% to 100% over 5–60 minutes, easing you out of sleep like a soft morning breeze. Without harsh alarms — just a gentle wake up light that makes every morning feel calmer, brighter, and truly refreshing. 【Sleep Deeply with Soothing Sounds】26 gentle sleep sounds, like white noise, ocean waves, rain, wind - help block distractions, quiet your thoughts, and guide you into deep, restful sleep. A 5–180 min timer automatically turns off sound and night light, supporting a peaceful and personalized bedtime routine. 【0-100% Dimmable Clock & Night Light】With a full-range display dimmer, get your personal comfort clock brightness without disturbing your sleep at night. 8 different colors of the nightlight with adjustable brightness. Soft light for reading, no eye strain for kids and adults. 【Ease into Setup】Designed for simplicity, the clock features clearly labeled icons and a logical layout for easy one-handed use. Just a quick glance to get started. With a built-in battery, you’ll worry about losing your alarm, light, or sound settings—even if the power goes out. 【Stylish Wood Design for Decor】 You will love the aesthetic of this sunrise clock sound machine. Sleek, clean, and modern make it looks like a beautiful piece of wood furniture. Functionality and stylish appearance make it a perfect gift for your family, lovers, friends, and kids.

name: Cadmos Loud Alarm Clocks for Heavy Sleepers,Adults,Kids,Teens,Large Digital Display,7 Color Night Light,Adjustable Volume,Battery Backup,Small Bedside Clocks for Bedrooms (White+Dynamic)
short_description: Loud Alarm Clock: Adjustable volume up to 105db with 3 levels, dual alarms, and a 10-minute ringer duration,ok to wake up for really heavy sleepers,adults,teens,kids Large Display: 2" jumbo illuminated LED digits for easy viewing, with 4 levels of adjustable brightness for optimal visibility Dynamic RGB Display And Nightlight: Enjoy 8 different colorful screens and a 7-color rainbow atmosphere light,adding a cool and fun touch to any desktop decoration Regular Features: This simple electric alarm clock has dual alarms, 10-minute snooze function, USB phone charging port, 12/24-hour time format, and weekday/weekend mode Outlet Powered And Battery Backup: This compact clock can be powered using the included USB power adapter, with a battery backup feature to maintain time and alarm settings during power outages What You Get: The smart clock comes with a USB power adapter, power cord, and user manual

It’s the perfect solution for heavy sleepers in your family or friends who struggle to wake up with regular beeping alarms.

name: Sharp Digital Alarm Clock – Black Case with Red LEDs - Ascending Alarm Grows Increasing Louder, Gentle Wake Up Experience, Dual Alarm - Battery Back-up, Easy to Use with Simple Operation
short_description: EASY TO USE DIGITAL ALARM CLOCK WITH DUAL ALARM - This clock has been designed with absolute simplicity in mind and is very easy to operate. Perfect for adults, children, teens, seniors and the elderly. EASY TO SET DUAL ALARM - Set one alarm for weekdays and the other for weekend! ASCENDING ALARM VOLUME - The ascending alarm begins sound faintly and then grew increasingly louder for gently wake up without being awakened abruptly ALARM BATTERY BACK UP (requires 2x AA battery, sold separately) Sleep with confidence knowing that your alarm will continue to function even in the event of a power outage. The display will be lit after power is restored. EASY TO READ ILLUMINATED RED LED DIGITS - Easy to Read Red Numbers on the clock are very clear with extra bright quality, See from across the room or even without glasses in the middle of the night!

name: Buffbee Sound Machine & Alarm Clock 2-in-1, 18 Soothing Sound, 7 Night Light, Sleep Timer, Precise 30-Level Volume Control White Noise Machine
short_description: 2-in-1: Designed with sound machine and alarm clock in one integrated machine. Helps block disruptive environmental noises in high quality 5W drivers and precise 30-level volume control, so you can fall asleep with ease. Sleeping Better with 18 Soothing Sounds: 5 white noise, 3 fan sounds and 10 nature sounds including ocean, lullaby, waves, rain, thunderstorm, brook, shush, bird chirping, summer night, campfire. Digital Alarm Clock with 5 Wake Up Sounds: Gently wake up to 5 optional alarm sounds with beep, bird chirping, piano, ocean and brook. 7 Night Light: Choose from 7 different night light color options to create a relaxing and sleeping-friendly ambience. 0-100% Display Dimmer: Get your personal comfort brightness with full range display dimmer slider without disturbing your sleep at night.

name: DreamSky Kids Alarm Clock with Night Light, Stay in Bed Clock for Boys and Girls, 5 Level Volume Control (Can't Be Muted), Cute Robot Shape Gifts
short_description: Cute Robot Design: This kids room clock is designed in a cuddly chubby robot shape, which is an instant hit with little ones and easily becomes a beloved bedtime buddy, making kids more willing to embrace sleep training. Establish Healthy Sleep Habbits for Children: Getting your kids to bed on time and staying asleep doesn't have to be an uphill battle. This kids digital clock utilizes colors and facial expressions to effectively teach kids about sleep time. When it's time to wind down, a soft red light accompanied by a closed eye expression on the robot's face gently signal that it's bedtime, making the process of building good sleep routines both fun and intuitive. Train Children To Getting Up Independently: With easy-to-read color single on this alarm clock, children will learn to stay in bed until the alarm goes off (alarm can't be muted, clock beeps when light turns green), the green light along with a wide energetic smile appears, signaling it's time to start the day. Soothing Night Light: The kids alarm clock also features one level white color night light which is enough to soothe nighttime fears or anxieties your child might have, without being overly harsh to disrupt their sleep. Easy Operation: Parents can easily customize sleep and wake-up times according to child's routine, adjust the alarm volume (L1-L5 5 level adjustable, no silent alarm option) and time format (standard time and military time), display brightness (5 level dimmer), all with the intuitive button on the back. A lock button helps to prevent accidental adjustments by kids. Power Source: Adapter powered (type-C adapter included) and AAA alkaline battery (not supplied) to store settings (battery compartment is screwed and safe for kids).

name: AYRELY® Super Loud Alarm Clock for Heavy Sleepers Adults,Twin Bell Retro 4 Inch Silent Non-Ticking Quartz with Backlight, Luminous dial, Alarm Clocks for Bedrooms Bedside (Silver)
short_description: 【Super Loud Alarm Clocks for Heavy Sleepers Adults】Designed with heavy sleepers and individuals who struggle to wake up in mind, this clock features a unique ringing mechanism. A battery-powered small metal hammer strikes the metal bells at a rapid rate, creating a powerful, resonant tone that reverberates through the room. Even the heaviest sleepers will be immediately roused by the clear, loud, and crisp sound produced by this mechanism. With no snooze button to tempt you back to sleep, this alarm ensures that adults, teens, children, and the elderly rise and greet the day with vigor. 【Luminous & Light Function】The clock dial is skillfully crafted with a durable plastic face infused with high-quality luminescent materials. Unlike ordinary clock faces with mere paper overlays, our clock face ensures long-lasting luminosity and superior readability. By absorbing normal indoor light or sunlight during the day, the dial and hands emit a gentle, enchanting glow throughout the night, making it effortless to check the time even in complete darkness. Moreover, a built-in light bulb allows for instant activation of the backlight with a simple button press, ensuring convenient nighttime viewing. 【Vintage Design】Radiating a captivating retro charm, our clock boasts a timeless twin bell design that never fails to impress. The meticulously crafted exterior showcases an elegant silver finish, accentuating its ornamental allure. Whether adorning a bedroom or a desk, this clock adds a touch of vintage elegance to any space. 【Silent Non-Ticking】The sweep second hand operates silently, devoid of any annoying ticking noise. Its noiseless movement creates an ideal environment for uninterrupted work and peaceful sleep, allowing you to fully immerse yourself in your tasks or enjoy restful slumber. 【Easy to Set】Setting the alarm is a breeze with a simple on/off switch. Adjusting the clock and alarm times is effortless, thanks to intuitive turn knobs that offer precise control. For enhanced convenience in low-light conditions, a dedicated button activates the gentle backlight, providing clear visibility and ensuring ease of use.

name: Digital Dual Alarm Clock for Bedroom, Easy to Set, 0-100% Dimmer, USB Charger, 5 Sounds Adjustable Volume, Weekday/Weekend Mode, Snooze, 12/24Hr, Battery Backup, Compact for Bedside(Blue)
short_description: EASY TO SETUP & 0-100% DIMMABLE DISPLAY - All buttons do one task and are clearly labeled makes setting the time or alarm extremely intuitive and straightforward. Large easy to read blue LED digits(1.6-inch tall) that can be easily viewed from a distance and the brightness can be easily adjusted from very bright to fully dark with the simple dimmer dial, which is nice for sleeping so you don't have a bright light in the room. 12 or 24 hour time display optional. CUSTOMIZABLE DUAL ALARM - Set two separate alarms to suit your different schedules and 7-5-2 alarm mode lets you set alarms for every day, weekdays or weekend. Wake up in the morning to one of the 5 built-in alarm tones (Beep, Birds Chirping, Buzzer, Soft Music, or Siren), which begins quietly and gradually becomes louder up to the level(30dB-110dB optional) you set, so you don’t get abruptly woken up. EASY SNOOZE & EASY TO TURN ON/OFF ALARMS - With its big and easy to reach Snooze button, you can get 9 minutes extra rest without fumbling around. And the two buttons to turn the alarms off are easy to reach from the front even when you are half-asleep. And with a large 4.9-inch display but compact size(5.3"x2.9"x1.95") makes it easy-to-read but space-saving, perfect for your bedroom, bedside, nightstand, desk, shelf, table or living room. USB PORT FOR CHARGING & BATTERY BACKUP - 1 USB port located at the back will charge your phone or other mobile device while you sleep. AC-powered, but you have the option to back it up with 3 AAA batteries (NOT included) in case of power outage. Not only time and settings are restored, but alarms are also supported (USB will not work). Please be noted that the clock may drain batteries quickly, so ONLY use as a backup but isn't viable for regular use. BUY WITH CONFIDENCE & GIFT IDEAS - All Odokee products offer a hassle-free 18-month warranty, easy return policy and friendly customer service. The stylish design makes it both functional and decorative, so it’s a great gift for kids, seniors, teens, boys, girls, friends or families.
